title: Notify Customer of Shipment
description: A customer's order has just shipped, and the logistics coordinator needs to send them an Advanced Shipping Notice (ASN).

tasks.description: Identify the sales order that has been shipped.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the sales order that was just processed for shipment.

tasks.description: Retrieve the carrier name and tracking number for the shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the tracking information from the shipment record.

tasks.description: Send the ASN to the customer, including the order details, carrier, and tracking number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the ASN email to the customer's registered contact.
